code: export function formatDate(dateString){var dateObj=new Date(dateString);var day=dateObj.getDate();var month=dateObj.getMonth().toString().length===1?"0".concat(dateObj.getMonth()):dateObj.getMonth();var year=dateObj.getFullYear();var hours=dateObj.getHours().toString().length===1?"0".concat(dateObj.getHours()):dateObj.getHours();var minutes=dateObj.getMinutes().toString().length===1?"0".concat(dateObj.getMinutes()):dateObj.getMinutes();return"".concat(day,".").concat(month,".").concat(year," ").concat(hours,":").concat(minutes);}
